alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Schenectady; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Schoharie; Southern Fulton; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 11:13PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 to 35 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1112 PM EDT, a snow squall was along a line extending from Northville to Richmondville and moving east at 35 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Northville and Northampton Beach Public Campground around 1120 PM EDT. Central Bridge around 1130 PM EDT. Berne around 1145 PM EDT. Altamont around 1155 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 88 between exits 20 and 25. Interstate 90 between exits 25a and 28. Interstate 890 between exits 1a and 9. Interstate 87 between exits 13S and 15. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
